Package app

Class RawDataRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.RawDataRepository
public class RawDataRepository extends Object
Repository class responsible for accessing RawData entries from the raw_readings table in the database.

This class serves as a data access layer and provides methods to query and retrieve raw sensor readings before they are filtered or transformed.

It is expected that the EntityManagerFactory is initialized externally (e.g., in the main application class) and injected into this repository upon construction.

Methods such as findAll() are intended to be implemented by the student as part of the practical exercise.

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      public List<RawData> findAll()
      Retrieves all raw data entries from the database.

      Note: This method should be implemented by the student. It is expected to use a JPQL or Criteria query to fetch all RawData records.

      Returns:
      a list of raw data records (to be implemented)
